replies.body: Yasuo with brawlers knuckle and IE still bugged and only gives 20% crit chance
Please give us back Kha's R passive this new 1 is bad and doesnt feel good. The upgrade on his R is not worth it any more and feels crap. GIVE BACK THE OLD 1
I don't have to stress on deciding which adaption I have to leave out anymore. I'm happy.
WHEN DOES ASOL SKIN COME OUT!?!?!
Riot once again proves that their unrivalled ability to ruin a great game as well as their overwhelming "retardedness"
ultimate hat is still around it's not in domination under the name "ultimate hunter" and in my opinion it's better so have fun with it {{sticker:sg-lux}}

I understand that the rune has moved, and has slightly changed, but does anyone run domination runes on mages? Also, "Unique takedowns"are alot harder to justify when you are playing Lux Support.  Please bring it back to where it was Riot
Theres a lot of errors in this patch notes. Vaynes previous hp is wrong and essence reaver doesnt mention that it gives 20% cdr flat and 300 mana.
also Phantom Dancer has the same 1000g combine cost as runnaans when it's 100g cheaper
